content.text: Match ends, Apollon Limassol 1, Lyon 1.
Second Half ends, Apollon Limassol 1, Lyon 1.
Goal!  Apollon Limassol 1, Lyon 1. Adrián Sardinero (Apollon Limassol) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nicolás Martínez with a cross.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Esteban Sachetti (Apollon Limassol).
Attempt missed. Emilio Jose Zelaya (Apollon Limassol) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Adrián Sardinero.

Esteban Sachetti (Apollon Limassol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
